mapper.sql: ID, CHANGE_ORDER_UID, PROJECT_UID, STATUS, STAGE, VERSION, EFFECTIVE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATOR, UPDATER, CREATE_DATE_CHANGE, UPDATE_DATE_CHANGE, CREATOR_CHANGE, UPDATER_CHANGE, FM_IS_RELEASE,SRC_MAIN_ID,CHANGE_STATUS
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_HZ_FC_MAIN_RECORD_CHANGE.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into HZ_FULL_CFG_MAIN_RECORD_CHANGE (ID, CHANGE_ORDER_UID, PROJECT_UID, STATUS, STAGE, VERSION, EFFECTIVE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATOR, UPDATER, CREATE_DATE_CHANGE, UPDATE_DATE_CHANGE, CREATOR_CHANGE, UPDATER_CHANGE, FM_IS_RELEASE,SRC_MAIN_ID,CHANGE_STATUS ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{changeOrderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{projectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{version,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{updater,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{createDateChange,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDateChange,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorChange,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{updaterChange,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{fmIsRelease,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{srcMainId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{changeStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.select:
select
from HZ_FULL_CFG_MAIN_RECORD_CHANGE where CHANGE_ORDER_UID = #{changeOrderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and CHANGE_STATUS = 0

select
from HZ_FULL_CFG_MAIN_RECORD_CHANGE where ID = (select Max(ID) from HZ_FULL_CFG_MAIN_RECORD_CHANGE where SRC_MAIN_ID = #{srcMainId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and CHANGE_STATUS = 1)

select
from HZ_FULL_CFG_MAIN_RECORD_CHANGE where ID = (select Max(ID) from HZ_FULL_CFG_MAIN_RECORD_CHANGE where PROJECT_UID = #{projectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CHANGE_STATUS = 1)
